data.text:
When the skies reopen, will your wanderlust be back with a vengeance? Will you set off on quick getaways every chance you get or will you maintain well-planned holidays over long weekends? Share your thoughts with us!

📸 Instagram dominikbelica, timmboslice_ https://t.co/7zhz6vEFBO

We have flown Hong Kong residents home from London with our first fully and voluntarily vaccinated aircrew. As we look forward to resuming regular air travel and welcoming you on our flights, we are doing our best to make every journey as worry-free as possible. #MoveBeyond https://t.co/yIFARtckT6

Q: What are the big white numbers on runways for?
A: They indicate the magnetic azimuth (compass bearing) 🧭 in which the runway is oriented, e.g. “36” represents 360º and “28” represents 280º.

Now, do you know why runway numbers change over time? Give it a guess! https://t.co/c0yVHPL5PD

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world

data.text:
We have shipped more than 15 million COVID-19 vaccines worldwide using our extensive global network of both freighter and passenger fleets. We stand ready to play our part as the world tackles the global pandemic. Learn more: https://t.co/a5mQmmM4u1  
#MoveBeyond https://t.co/o741o6wDT0
*Minimum spend of 5,000 miles per booking. Terms and conditions apply.

urls.title: Miles Plus Cash
urls.description: With Miles Plus Cash—our new payment option for tickets—you can use a mix of Asia Miles and cash payment when booking on our site, starting 30 March.

data.text: "Miles Plus Cash" also provides you with access to more seat options on our flights and those offered by our partner airlines, and allows instant booking confirmations so you can spend more and earn more @AsiaMiles.* https://t.co/Rpi4maMNVd

Miles or cash? Enjoy the flexibility of both
 
Flexible and easy to use, our "Miles Plus Cash" payment option gives you the freedom to choose your seats, flights and destinations. https://t.co/zsCjizw5sy
@EmilySiu14 We apologize for the technical errors due to high demand for the London special flights. If you would like to know more details, please DM us , thank you.
@EmilySiu14 Here is the Hong Kong reservation office number: +852 2747 3333

This month, Jabeen Zafar brings us to Dockweiler State Beach in California, US. Home to an enclosure for the protected western snowy plover, this beach boasts 3.7 miles of gorgeous oceanfront. Its scenic bike trail is perfect for a leisurely cycle and watching the sunset!

data.text:
When a plane lands, its wings sometimes emit a strong cloak of cloud. This is due to lift forces that cause a sudden drop in air pressure and temperature, which can cause water vapour to condense into water droplets, which we see as clouds. Mystery solved!

📸 IG@reepair1556 https://t.co/GfCxViqOFL

Bauhinia x blakeana was discovered in Mount Davis, Hong Kong. It was eventually cultivated in the Botanic Gardens and can be now seen all over the city. What’s your favourite flower?

📸 IG@careless.shooter https://t.co/ZFQG4tLopF

We look forward to welcoming you on board our flights, and bringing you closer to loved ones and fresh adventures across the globe.
#MoveBeyond #TillWeFlyAgain

Our aircrew are getting vaccinated

We simply can't wait to fly with you again, so our aircrew have been voluntarily receiving vaccinations. To prepare for the resumption of regular air travel, we have also been adhering to strict hygiene and safety standards. https://t.co/cJ1WHQceqL

data.text:
Bold and iconic, the Cathay Pacific logo was first unveiled in 1994 on the Airbus A330. Its design reflects a single stroke of a calligrapher’s brush, which establishes our Asian identity and represents a bird in flight. Do you know what it’s called?

📸 @speedbirdhd https://t.co/T1obv7bVm9

A big thank you to our Cargo and Flight Operations teams. Since the release of COVID-19 vaccines, they have been working hard to deliver vaccines to the world with precision and professionalism. We will continue to do our part in this challenging chapter of history. #MoveBeyond https://t.co/f8CJihoYoX

data.text:
As we welcome the Year of the Ox, we look forward to new beginnings and the promise of new possibilities. For us, this means taking off with you once again. Happy Lunar New Year, from all of us at Cathay Pacific.
#MoveBeyond https://t.co/V7zWJbOPzN

5/5 If you have received an email you think is suspicious, please do not click on any links contained within them or supply any personal information, including credit card details that could be used to identify you.
Learn More: https://t.co/No5gyHkgDE

4/5  If you would like to make changes to your booking and you booked through Cathay Pacific, visit https://t.co/wa5i1yhkCZ. If you purchased your ticket through a third party, please contact them directly to organise your change.
3/5  Please note that we will not ask customers to reveal personal information, such as passwords, credit card numbers and account information via email.
2/5  We believe that scammers are attempting to deceive customers into providing sensitive information through their participation in fraudulent forms.

data.text:
Plane windows are an iconic frame for your views from the top, but have you ever wondered why they’re round? That’s because round cutouts in the fuselage – the main body of the aircraft – are stronger than square ones, which helps reduce fatigue!

📸: IG@notatravelbloggr https://t.co/Mq7dO9cxVp

data.text:
From skating ⛸ on frozen lakes to bathing in hot springs ♨, what do you love most about #winter travel? Perhaps hiking in snowy Sobaeksan 🗻 in Danyang County, South Korea and admiring the snow-covered roofs of Guinsa nestled in its valleys.

📸: IG@namchosun_landscapes https://t.co/tJ0u08iE6Q

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: Our flights from HKG to London-Heathrow (LHR) will resume from 12 Jan. In light of the HKSAR Government’s ongoing ban on all flights from the UK to HKG, flights from London and Manchester to HKG will remain suspended. More: https://t.co/sxAQDMeJkj https://t.co/YGocdKKbUr

Welcome to the Cathay Fan Guided Tour 2021! Every month, a fan will share a secret hangout in their hometown. We'd love to hear from you! Let’s start our journey on the eastern end of Hong Kong at Tin Ha Shan, a go-to spot for locals to watch the sun rise.

📸: IG@shine.with.mi https://t.co/aGzdQkryW3

This year has made us more appreciative of travel than ever. As we welcome 2021 with renewed optimism, we have 7 little things we are most thankful for about flying. Can you find them all? https://t.co/8gCHHiXUSz
The latest compulsory quarantine requirements for all passengers to Hong Kong were updated. Please refer to HKSAR Government's website - https://t.co/rWXE25wS5v for details. https://t.co/Objk8ZxLJ4

data.text:
Pet logs and fried chicken may not remind many of Christmas. But for the following quirky traditions, they couldn’t be more festive! Share with us some other distinctive Christmas traditions that you know of!

📸: IG@masa_jb74, kris_brewes, glitter_skulls, pastrybymamijo https://t.co/MAg5bMbSHE

In light of the HKSAR Government’s announcement today, we have decided to cancel specific passenger flights from 21 December to 10 January 2021. Details: https://t.co/KFfVGeehGi https://t.co/5f62UxBavZ

As the epidemiological condition develops in Europe, we will maintain a skeleton but critical airlink between #Europe / #Israel and our home #HongKong in the coming 10 days. For more details, please visit https://t.co/ZS3zOF8bWF https://t.co/RMpmnww7Cw

data.text:
While most greenhouses protect plants from the cold, the Flower Dome 🌷 and the Cloud Forest ☁ in #Singapore are cool conservatories that cultivate plants from colder climates. In fact, the Flower Dome is also the largest glass greenhouse in the world!

📸: IG@edwardkb https://t.co/U3Bb5faKpZ

data.text:
In a year of keeping our distance, finally being together will be truly worth celebrating.
We can’t wait to fly you to your loved ones again.
Season’s greetings and a happy new year, from all of us at Cathay Pacific.

#MoveBeyond https://t.co/AU8RB2Gukk

data.text:
Welcome aboard the flight to everywhere! Why restrict ourselves to nowhere when we can go around the earth at the speed of the Internet? Look out of the window. Can you guess the destinations we’re flying by?
 
📸: IG@itsbernie81, xd_alexey, seelautravel https://t.co/4TvzjLk6Pk

☕ or 🍵?
There comes a time in a flight when you will be asked this question. If you answer tea, put the luscious tea plantations of #Uji on your list. Located between Kyoto and Nara, the name Uji is regarded in #Japan as the benchmark of high quality tea leaf!

📸@horiimiho29 https://t.co/Eo0nUI0oXu

📸: IG@speechlessword._.image https://t.co/fe38TFwoJu

data.text: Enjoy complete care for complete peace of mind when you fly with us. 📸: IG@ployslittleatlas https://t.co/jr46yl1Tsu

data.text:
Considered one of the six holiest places to worship in #Bali, Pura Penataran Agung Lempuyang is famed for its Gates of Heaven with a majestic mountain as its background. Do you know the name of this mountain?

📸: IG@jordhammond https://t.co/l7aqdpjfs2

When flying, pilots use position lights to determine the direction of travel of other aircraft. These green and red position lights are to differentiate the left and the right wings. Can you guess where the green light goes? https://t.co/ZumVBYBLkd

We expect to operate very busy flights from the United Kingdom to Hong Kong. Please arrive at the airport at least 4 hours before departure. From all of us at Cathay Pacific Europe, we look forward to welcoming you on board and wish you a safe and pleasant trip home.

data.text:
Just as how travel opens up worlds, gates mark the transition between different spaces. The iconic Fushimi Inari Taisha in #Japan features many torii gates ⛩ across its grounds. Can you guess approximately how many are there? 

📸: IG@craigtphoto https://t.co/G50hDhRvwB

You don’t need to be an #avgeek to recognise the Airbus A350 – the newest aircraft in the Cathay Pacific fleet. ✈️ Can you name one feature that makes it so distinctive? Tell us in the comments!

📸: IG@miku.photography https://t.co/kyvcyhkqiI

Bright red leaves. 🍂 Juicy orange hairy crabs. 🦀 Autumn brings with it new colours and traditions such as momijigari, the popular Japanese practice of leaf peeping. What are some of your favourite activities during autumn?
 
📸: IG@missfrenchyjapan https://t.co/aehHbQYcU5

data.text:
Even if we aren’t flying, it’s important to stay on the move! And if you look around you’ll find some gorgeous sporting grounds – like these courts designed by One Bite Design Studio that are located on the rooftop of Siu Hei Court in Tuen Mun.

📸: IG@jsrpixel https://t.co/zwhQSqO2RE

On planes equipped with High-Efficiency-Particulate Arrestors (HEPA) filters, fresh air enters via the engines and is pumped from the ceiling into the cabins. Used air is sucked out of the cabin below the window seats. Can you guess where the used air eventually exits the plane? https://t.co/IajLEF9eCI

data.text:
Known as the Garden City, Singapore boasts many buildings 🏢 that include nature 🌳 in innovative ways – like the tiered sky gardens of PARKROYAL COLLECTION Pickering. In your travels, have you seen some great examples of the fusion between city and nature?

📸: IG@kevouthere https://t.co/H41ck3fZWv

For you, I would fly to the moon and back, but I would rather you be on this journey with me.
Happy Mid-Autumn Festival!

#cathaypacific #MoveBeyond #midautumnfestival https://t.co/quK14m5N7A

Located off the coast of Clear Water Bay, this sunny island resembles a certain ingredient sometimes found in the kitchen. Known by some as Lan Pai, can you guess its more commonly-used nickname? Here’s a hint: 🥚

📸: IG@viva_924, sssinnn https://t.co/wJGUQVF8fK

As an airline that cares about sustainable development, we continue to work hard on our environmental footprint wherever we operate. We took some time to answer the top questions #YouAskedUs about sustainability. Watch the full video at: https://t.co/xxVMG0esHo https://t.co/IMfCP5pWCB
